text: 6|44|Sihamtaka yi upadesa diya haichila seya yetiya sihamte paharai ga’la, tetiya ami sihamtara babe sakalo bastura duraara mukali karai dilo; arasesata sihamtaka yi pradana karaa haichila yetiya sihamte tata utphullita ha’la tetiya hathat sihamtaka ataka karailo, phalata tetiya'i sihamta niraasa ha’la.
